org.apache.river.test.spec.loader.util

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.spec.loader.util.Util

  • public class Util
extends Object
    Helper class to define preferred/non-preferred classes/resources. Static arrays of this class describe classes/resources names and it's preffered status according with org/apache/river/test/spec/loader/util/classes/META-INF/PREFERRED.LIST file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Item[] listClasses
      Static array of classes to be preferred or not preferred
      static Item[] listInterfaces
      Static array of interfaces to be loaded
      static Item[] listLocalClasses
      Static array of classes which can be found in the executing VM's classpath only
      static Item[] listLocalResources
      Static resources of resources which can be found in the executing VM's classpath only
      static Item[] listNotAvailableClasses
      Static array of classes which cannot be found in the executing VM's classpath and cannot be downloaded, but defined in the PREFERRED.LIST file
      static Item[] listResources
      Static array of resources to be preferred or not preferred
      static String NOPREFERREDListJarFile
      jar file without preferred list, but with classes and resources
      static String PREFERREDJarFile
      jar file with preferred list, classes and resources
      static String QAJarFile
      jar file in the executing VM's classpath

      • getUrlAddr

        public static String getUrlAddr(boolean isHttp,
                                QAConfig config,
                                int port)
                         throws TestException
        Returns http or file based url address to download preferred classes.
        Parameters:
        isHttp - if true will return http based url address otherwise - file based.
        config - the QAConfig object.
        port - http port.
        Returns:
        url address.
        Throws:
        TestException

      • getUrls

        public static URL[] getUrls(boolean isHttp,
                            String file1,
                            String file2,
                            QAConfig config,
                            int port)
                     throws TestException
        Returns http or file URLs for file1 and file2.
        Parameters:
        isHttp - if true will return http based urls otherwise - file based.
        file1 - jar file to download classes/resources.
        file2 - jar file to download classes/resources.
        Returns:
        array of urls that represent file1 and file2.
        Throws:
        TestException
